welcome: Welcome on the framework Mora cli
firewall_check_comment: return the required condition to pass the firewall
firewall_onfailed_comment: Put the action to do if a this firewall is not passed
controller_create_desc: Create a new controller and set optionaly its actions
rename_required_names: Old name and new name required.
firewall_rename_success: The firewall {old}'s name was changed to {new}.
firewall_name_conflict: The name {name} is already used by another firewall.
controller_exists_prompt:
The controller {name} already exists.
If you continue, it will be overwriten.<nc>
Try 'php mora controller add_actions action1[,action2...]' instead.
Continue?(yes/no)[<yellow>no<nc>]
